guide.introduction: Instead of tossing a perfectly good shampoo bottle,recycle it and make a BB holder that will do the job and hold more BBS depending on what you use
guide.introduction_rendered: Instead of tossing a perfectly good shampoo bottle,recycle it and make a BB holder that will do the job and hold more BBS depending on what you use

lines.text: Depening on the BB,the shampoo hole where the shampoo came out of will need expansion in some cases
lines.text_raw: Depening on the BB,the shampoo hole where the shampoo came out of '''will need expansion in some cases'''

lines.text: To do this, use a 5 1/4 drillbit or bigger and clean it of shampoo
lines.text_raw: To do this, use a 5 1/4 drillbit or bigger and clean it of shampoo

lines.text: Remove the ugly label and the adhesive to make it prettier
lines.text_raw: Remove the ugly label and the adhesive to make it prettier

guide.title: DIY BB holder
